divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS AT 21 & GARFIELD WHEN I SAW UP TO TEN ORANGE-RED OBJECTS HOVERING AND MANUEVERING IN NON AIRCRAFT LIKE WAYS. THE ONE THAT WAS AT THE HIGHEST ELEVATION WAS ALSO THE CLOSET. I COULD MAKE OUT A DISC SHAPE IN THE LIGHT. I TOOK A VIDEO WITH MY IPHONE. BUT IT IS EXTREMELY POOR IN QUALITY.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: UP TO TEN ORANGE OBJECTS IN SKY
